front.title: P2P Streaming for Mobile Nodes: Scenarios and Related Issues

abstract.t: The scenarios where a Peer-to-Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP) contains mobile nodes need special considerations. An analysis of all the scenarios that involve mobile nodes is necessary to provide the guidelines to PPSP protocol design and applicability. This document describes some key issues for a PPSP network with mobile nodes, and proposes some additional requirements for PPSP to handle these scenarios.
